Cobb (Leonardo DiCaprio in "Titanic") is a skilled thief, the absolute best in the dangerous art of extraction, stealing valuable secrets from deep subconscious during the dream state of the victims, when the mind is most vulnerable. The Cobb's rare ability has made him a coveted player in his treacherous new world of corporate espionage, but it has also made him an international fugitive, which cost him everything you once loved.

Now Cobb has a chance at redemption. One last job could give him his life back but only if he can accomplish the impossible - the insertion of the origin of an idea.
